arts.ttl: The lowdown on Huddersfield Town 2 Charlton Athletic 1 - Addicks slip to second consecutive defeat as skipper Greg Docherty is sent off in Yorkshire
arts.sum: Charlton Athletic: Maynard-Brewer, Gillesphey, A Mitchell, Edwards, Edmonds-Green (T Campbell 66), Small, Coventry, Docherty, Anderson (Berry 80), Leaburn (Hylton 80), Godden (Ahadme 74). David Kasumu drove the hosts back in front just beyond the hour-mark with Charlton unable to rescue a point despite a handful of good chances late on.

arts.ttl: Charlton manager Nathan Jones will weigh up options to appeal Greg Docherty’s red card at Huddersfield
arts.sum: Nathan Jones is set to weigh up his options before deciding if he will appeal the red card shown to Greg Docherty at Huddersfield. For me, it’s a very difficult red card to give.

arts.ttl: Nathan Jones: Red card shown to Greg Docherty during loss at Huddersfield changed the game
arts.sum: We weren’t able to be as aggressive or front-footed as we want but even with that, we created three or four good chances in the second-half that we should have scored. Miles Leaburn and Gassan Ahadme both headed wide late on as Charlton slipped to a second consecutive league defeat.

arts.ttl: Huddersfield extend unbeaten run to six games with victory over Charlton
Charlton Athletic goalkeeper Ashley Maynard-Brewer explains reasoning behind ditching mask
arts.sum: “I’m pretty sure he (Jones) said he wasn’t going to stand in my way if there were any opportunities that did come up. Ashley Maynard-Brewer is back in goal for Charlton Athletic but with one difference – he is no longer sporting a protective mask.

arts.ttl: Huddersfield Town boss: ‘Charlton Athletic’s League One stint shows promotion is not a simple task’
arts.sum: “If you go to the stadium, look at the budget, the amount of supporters they have got, and they have got an extra Premier League manager in charge. “If anyone knows a Nathan Jones side, you’re going to have to scrap and fight.

arts.ttl: ‘Really underwhelming’ – Huddersfield Town vs Charlton Athletic prediction: The72
arts.sum: The72's writers offer their Huddersfield Town vs Charlton Athletic prediction ahead of the League One clash on Saturday. The post ‘Really underwhelming’ – Huddersfield Town vs Charlton Athletic prediction: The72 appeared first on The72 - Football League News.
